C

calculateCosine(LinkedList<Map.Entry<Map<String, Object>, Map<String, Double>>>, Map<String, Double>) - Static method in class documentclassifier.Metriche.TFIDFComparator
Static method used to calculate the cosine of the angle between each document of a set (represented by a vector that for each document's term contains its relative frequency), and a reference document (query).
calculateDistance(LinkedList<Map.Entry<Map<String, Object>, Map<String, Double>>>, Map<String, Double>) - Static method in class documentclassifier.Metriche.BhattacharryaDistanceComparator
Static method used for calculation of the Bhattacharrya distance, between each document of a set (represented by a vector that for each document's term contains its relative frequency), and a reference document (query).
cancel() - Method in class documentclassifier.PreferencesDialog
This action is called each time that the user presses the button 'Cancel' in the GUI.
closeAboutBox() - Method in class documentclassifier.DocumentClassifierAboutBox
 
compare(Map.Entry<Map<String, Object>, Map<String, Double>>, Map.Entry<Map<String, Object>, Map<String, Double>>) - Method in class documentclassifier.Metriche.BhattacharryaDistanceComparator
Method that implements the interface Comparator, to compare two documents whose Bhattacharrya distance to the query document has been calculated.
compare(Map.Entry<Map<String, Object>, Map<String, Double>>, Map.Entry<Map<String, Object>, Map<String, Double>>) - Method in class documentclassifier.Metriche.TFIDFComparator
Method that implements the interface Comparator, to compare two documents whose TF-IDF values (for each term) have been calculated.
